parameters:
It was sunny until a moment ago, but now a storm is
raging.
It seems to represent my melancholic heart.
Ah~ I want to have sex~
Don't say that out loud, you damn monkey.

That face is the one he makes when they're thinking about
naughty things.
By the way, it's raining pretty hard.
That's right...hmm. Hopefully the ship is safe.
Ah... Didn't I say before that the pier is a bit old?

It's not just "a bit old", it's at a point where it might
break and get washed away somewhere.

Hahaha, not like it'll happen just because of the
rain, right?

Since the ship doesn't have sails, there's no need to worry
too much!

Well, if we think logically, even if we are hit by wind and
rain, the ship shouldn't be washed away.

If you want to date a girl, don't you think you have to
throw away common sense?
Huh? What are you talking about?
The girls in our group are all quite high level.

I'd turn them all down at a mixer though.
Hahaha!

Ah, could it be that the president is also targeting
someone...!
No, and it's got nothing to do with taste.
Speaking of taste though, I prefer a slightly plump older woman.
(Even though they're only one year younger than us...)

If we're talking about plump... Akane-chan, aren't
her boobs way too big?
What should I say about Akane... No, rather...
Well... I don't really think about romance, so...

Hahaha! Since that time he got severely burned before,
it's a bit difficult for him to meet women!

When men gather, is it inevitable for things to go in this
direction?

When she insults me with those cold eyes, it kinda gives me
a naughty feeling.
Don't pretend like you know me from now on.
This guy! Don't get too close!

Well, if we're talking about a good girl, Kanae is also a
good choice.
I'm attracted to strong-willed women... And so I...
How did it lead up to that?
So, Hikaru, who is your favorite?

Instead of just listening all the time, Hikaru, why don't you
say something too?
Huh... I see, so that's how it is.
But aren't you always together, just the two of you?
But, that's just because we happen to have the same schedule.
We're in the same class, so...
And I'm a male high school student.

I can't understand at all what Hikaru means by saying We
have the same schedule.
What's with that pitying gaze looking down on me!

You probably won't have any connection with women for the
rest of your life, right?!

Don't you often go to cafes with Kanae? It seems like I
often see you together on Instagram.

Well... it's because they like crepes. They often stop by that
place in Kawamachi.
By the way, doesn't Kanae have some feelings?

Generally, if women don't have a favorable impression of couple
shots and such, they won't upload them on Instagram.
Haha, no way. It's just something like her writing a diary.
I will fight to the death!
I'm gonna give a big cheer!

If it's someone I'm interested in... hmm... maybe
Tsugumi.
Oh, really? Surprising. Hikaru, are you also a masochist?
No... why are we suddenly talking about masochism?

But, Tsugumi-chan, while looking down on me with that cold
and cute face, saying something like "Die, you bastard!"
No, I've never heard those words before.

After I finally got to peek a bit of ass from behind!
That's so mean!
Actually, I got a little excited.
(This guy is hopeless... I need to do something quickly...)
Well, they may be a bit unfriendly, but...

I think someone might be interested in Hikaru though. There's a
different atmosphere than when they interact with us.

Stop it already, are you all obsessed with romance or
something?
...You probably only think that because Kanae's my friend.
More like a friend of a friend?

Are they the protagonist of a light novel? Life must be
easy for them.

Ah, so they're the boob-chan. I see. Boob-chan can't be
helped.

Saruyama pounced on the name that unintentionally slipped out
of their mouth like a hyena.

When calling someone Boob-chan, it's a way of calling them
that can only be done by someone really messed up.
Oh wow, this person is dangerous. Hehehehe...

They also look dangerous like a delinquent, don't they,
senpai?

No, it's not like... It's not because of her... chest that
I'm interested.

When they're around, it's like something calming... They're
incredibly cheerful, so it actually makes me feel calm.

Are you pretending to be a gentleman all by yourself? It's
a rare boys' talk, so it would be nice if you could be
a little more honest.
Boys talk really just echoes with the smell of sweat.
More importantly, you should be careful.
Hahaha, Hikaru is a model student after all.
Yeah, yeah. Don't go putting weird things in my head.

By the way, Akane-chan is the representative of our
prefecture. It seems like she's not currently active as
an athlete though...
Ah, well, there was a little incident.

If you want to know, ask the person themselves. It's a
bit of a delicate issue.

By the way, you seem to know a lot. How did you know that
she used to be an athlete?
I'm also a member of the fan club!
There is someone I'm a little curious about.

Speaking of Renka, they seem to be strangely spinning their
wheels, don't you think?

Ah, they're a bad senior who even tries to lay their hands
on innocent first-year students...!
No, no, no, why do you think that way?
There are no friends between men and women.
There are plenty. They are pure enough.

Renka-chan, there are some not-so-good rumors about them in the
department.

Hmm, they're a bit too laid-back and can't seem to adapt
among girls.

Well, it's fine, isn't it? If they're comfortable with
themselves, then that's good enough.
They don't seem to feel inconvenienced at all.
Someone who can talk anytime shouldn't say things like that!
Even if I try to talk to them, they don't respond to me...
(Why do they try to get involved with women?)

They spent their last night together like that, and went to
bed.
